verses.name: Acts 27:28
verses.text: And sounded, and found it twenty fathoms: and when they had gone a little further, they sounded again, and found it fifteen fathoms.

verses.name: Acts 27:29
verses.text: Then fearing lest we should have fallen upon rocks, they cast four anchors out of the stern, and wished for the day.

verses.name: Acts 27:30
verses.text: And as the shipmen were about to flee out of the ship, when they had let down the boat into the sea, under colour as though they would have cast anchors out of the foreship,

verses.name: Acts 27:31
verses.text: Paul said to the centurion and to the soldiers, Except these abide in the ship, ye cannot be saved.
